quest.name: Deal by the Docks
journal:
Maru is evaluating you with an unsettling look.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Deliver the elegant purse to Khanga.
Deliver the pouch of mysterious dried goods to the Lominsan visitor.
Deliver the familiar wooden crate to Maru.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Tell me, Forename─you're from Eorzea, ain't you?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Just so happens we've got a deal lined up with an Eorzean trader, but... We don't want no trouble, is all. You don't mind actin' as my middleman, do you?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Alright, you'll need to pick up our side of the bargain from a fisher called Khanga in Akyaali. Hand him this─he'll know what to do.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Take what he gives you to the Eorzean trader at the docks in Yedlihmad, an' then report back with the goods once you've finished. Easy, right?

dialogue.name: KHANGA
dialogue.text: Ah. Maru's “favor,” yes... I see you've brought payment in full.

dialogue.name: KHANGA
dialogue.text: He wanted these seen safely into the hands of a certain Lominsan visitor. I assume I can trust you with the rest?

dialogue.name: KHANGA
dialogue.text: Have you not a delivery to make?

dialogue.name: LIMSAMARINER04552
dialogue.text: Ho, there! You wouldn't happen to be Master Maru's associate, now would you?

dialogue.name: LIMSAMARINER04552
dialogue.text: Oh, good! I've been eagerly awaiting your arrival, misssir. Yours is my final trade, so it's back to the diamond of the Rhotano I go.

dialogue.name: LIMSAMARINER04552
dialogue.text: These? Why, they're the finest dried ingredients this side of the Bounty! Make for a glorious soup stock...and fetch a glorious price, at that. Limsa Lominsa is a culinary capital, after all. For her chefs, only the very best will suffice.

dialogue.name: LIMSAMARINER04552
dialogue.text: Well then, a pleasure doing business with you! This crate contains Master Maru's goods─send him my regards, yes?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Brilliant! I knew you were the right womanman for the job. I reckoned that skipper might've skipped clear away if one of us came lumberin' at him, fish or no...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Oh, this? It's a prototype for a new kinda wheel. There's this really reputable company in Limsa that's comin' up with upgrades for our carts.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We've gotta make sure we can handle any road now that we're ridin' all over the island. Can't wait to give these a spin...
